text:
*[Bug 18662] New: Consider signing R binaries + DLLs?*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18662>

            Bug ID: 18662
           Summary: Consider signing R binaries + DLLs?
           Product: R
           Version: R-devel (trunk)
          Hardware: x86_64/x64/amd64 (64-bit)
                OS: Windows 64-bit
            Status: UNCONFIRMED
          Severity: enhancement
          Priority: P5
         Component: Windows GUI / Window specific
          Assignee: <mailto:R-core@R-project.org|R-core@R-project.org>
          Reporter: <mailto:kevinushey@gmail.com|kevinushey@gmail.com>

Currently, the R installer (checked with R 4.3.2) is signed with a digital
signature courtesy of Martyn Plummer. Is it worth considering signing the other
binary artifacts within the installer as well; that is, the executables and
DLLs published with R?
